title: unable to download the client
body: So, I have this problem where it does not let me download the client,  and I do not know to fix it. please help

replies.body:
Most of the time the client pops this unspecified error message it can be taken as a sign that your OS doesn't have all of the right permissions in place so that League is able to scan the game files. If League isn't able to scan those files, then it won't ever be able to get through this update.

Run through this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get that update running, if not feel free to hit me back up!
